name: Swarm of Quippers
description: A swarm of small, sharp-toothed fish that can strip flesh from bone within seconds, found lurking in murky waters.
memorable: Known for overwhelming enemies in numbers, particularly drawn to injured or bleeding creatures.
goals: To hunt and incapacitate prey, especially drawn to blood.
relations: Can often be found in rivers, lakes, or coastal waters, can swarm over larger aquatic creatures.
strengths: Fast swimming ability allows for quick maneuvers and rapid frenzied attacks.
weaknesses: Relatively low Constitution making it susceptible to damage despite resistance to non-magical physical attacks.
attacks: Bites attack that inflicts piercing damage, with enhanced attacks when bloodied.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Frenzy, granting advantage against wounded opponents.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to navigate murky waters effectively.
skills: No significant skill proficiencies but immune to various condition effects.
additional_information: Cannot regain hit points or temporary hit points.
Occupies the space of other creatures easily.
Drawn to the scent of blood in the water.
Ability to swarm over enemies emphasizes cooperative predation.
test_queries: school of biting fish in water
dangerous swarm of fish in lakes
